PackageOracle.name: DA_INTERNAL_SYSTEM
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_INTERNAL_SYSTEM
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.57.043090000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,system_nm IN VARCHAR2
,system_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,system_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_internal_system;

body.name: DA_INTERNAL_SYSTEM
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_INTERNAL_SYSTEM
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.57.052974000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,system_nm IN VARCHAR2
,system_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_internal_system.add, parms=' || system_nm || '|' || system_desc || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_internal_system a
(
a.system_nm
,a.system_desc
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.system_nm
,add.system_desc
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_internal_system.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,system_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_internal_system.del, parms=' || system_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_internal_system a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.system_nm = del.system_nm
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_internal_system.del');

END del;

END da_internal_system;
